mapper.select: select * from hon_joinc where cid=#{cid} and cpw=#{cpw}
mapper.update: update ceo_store set sname = #{sname} and location = #{location} and phone = #{phone} and simage =#{simage} and OpeningT = #{OpeningT} and RestT = #{RestT} and website = #{website} and RestD = #{RestD} and info = #{info} where sid = #{sid};
